name: ShabbosTimes
0:
”Alexa, what time is Shabbos?”
”Alexa, ask What Time is Shabbos in 10001”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: what time is shabbos
des:
This skill provides Shabbos times using your Alexa's device address. You can also provide a US zipcode if you don't want to share your full address or if you want to know Shabbos times for a different area. If given a zip code, the candle lighting time will be converted to your time zone, if Alexa can access it, otherwise, it will be in the given zipcode's timezone. Alexa will tell you whether the given time is in your time zone or theirs.

Please Note:
- Candle lighting times provided are 18 minutes prior to sunset
- If there's no street address registered to your Alexa account, or the current street address isn't recognized, but there is a valid zipcode, the candle lighting times will only be as accurate as it can be given just a zipcode
